Name: line_number
Description: line number of this rule in pg_hba.conf

Name: database
Description: list of database name(s) to which this rule applies

Name: user_name
Description: list of user and group name(s) to which this rule applies

Name: address
Description: host name or ip address, or one of all, samehost, or samenet, or null for local connections

Name: netmask
Description: ip address mask, or null if not applicable

Name: options
Description: options specified for authentication method, if any

Name: error
Description: if not null, an error message indicating why this line could not be processed
